userStories.title: End-to-End Testing - Core User Flows
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I want to verify all core user flows work correctly via Chrome browser testing.
acceptanceCriteria: Flow 1 - Guest Single Player: Open landing ‚Üí Play Now ‚Üí Guest auth ‚Üí GameplayPage loads real puzzle ‚Üí Fill cells ‚Üí Complete puzzle ‚Üí Completion modal ‚Üí Save to backend
Flow 2 - Registration and Profile: Landing ‚Üí Register ‚Üí Verify redirect ‚Üí Navigate to Profile ‚Üí Stats load and display ‚Üí Crossy mascot appears
Flow 3 - Archive and History: Login ‚Üí Archive page ‚Üí Puzzle list loads ‚Üí Click past puzzle ‚Üí Complete puzzle ‚Üí History page ‚Üí Completed puzzle in history

Flow 4 - Multiplayer Collaborative: Two browser windows ‚Üí User 1 creates room ‚Üí User 2 joins with code ‚Üí Both see lobby ‚Üí Start game ‚Üí User 1 types in cell ‚Üí User 2 sees update ‚Üí User 2 moves cursor ‚Üí User 1 sees colored cursor

Flow 5 - Multiplayer Chat and Reactions: Two users in game ‚Üí User 1 sends chat ‚Üí User 2 receives immediately ‚Üí User 2 replies ‚Üí User 1 receives ‚Üí User 1 sends reaction ‚Üí Animated emoji appears on both screens ‚Üí Emoji floats and fades

Flow 6 - Race Mode: Create room with Race mode ‚Üí Join with second user ‚Üí Start game ‚Üí Progress bars show for each player ‚Üí Complete puzzle faster on one user ‚Üí Winner modal appears for both ‚Üí Correct winner announced

Flow 7 - Relay Mode: Create room with Relay mode ‚Üí Join with second user ‚Üí Start game ‚Üí Turn indicator shows whose turn ‚Üí Only current player can edit ‚Üí Complete word ‚Üí Pass Turn ‚Üí Turn switches to other player

Flow 8 - Error Handling: Join invalid room code ‚Üí Error message shows ‚Üí Access protected page without auth ‚Üí Redirect and auth modal ‚Üí Disconnect network mid-game ‚Üí WebSocket reconnection works ‚Üí UI shows disconnected state

Flow 9 - Design Consistency: Navigate all pages ‚Üí Crossy purple theme on all pages ‚Üí Pixel font usage for headings ‚Üí Mascot images appear appropriately ‚Üí Button styles match Landing page ‚Üí Card designs match patterns ‚Üí Responsive design works on mobile viewport
